Weather Data

Source: R/weather_data.R
weather_data.Rd

A dataset containing detailed weather information.

Usage

weather_data

Format

A data frame with N rows and 35 columns:

id

Unique identifier for the weather station.

fecha

Date of the measurement (in "YYYY-MM-DD" format).

temperatura_abrigo_150cm

Average temperature recorded at 150 cm in a meteorological shelter (in degrees Celsius).

temperatura_abrigo_150cm_maxima

Maximum temperature recorded at 150 cm in a meteorological shelter (in degrees Celsius).

temperatura_abrigo_150cm_minima

Minimum temperature recorded at 150 cm in a meteorological shelter (in degrees Celsius).

temperatura_intemperie_5cm_minima

Minimum temperature recorded at 5 cm outdoors (in degrees Celsius).

temperatura_intemperie_50cm_minima

Minimum temperature recorded at 50 cm outdoors (in degrees Celsius).

temperatura_suelo_5cm_media

Average soil temperature at 5 cm depth (in degrees Celsius).

temperatura_suelo_10cm_media

Average soil temperature at 10 cm depth (in degrees Celsius).

temperatura_inte_5cm

Average temperature recorded at 5 cm outdoors (in degrees Celsius).

temperatura_intemperie_150cm_minima

Minimum temperature recorded at 150 cm outdoors (in degrees Celsius).

humedad_suelo

Soil moisture percentage.

precipitacion_pluviometrica

Accumulated rainfall over a period (in mm).

granizo

Presence of hail (yes/no).

nieve

Presence of snow (yes/no).

heliofania_efectiva

Effective sunshine hours.

heliofania_relativa

Percentage of effective sunshine relative to the maximum possible.

tesion_vapor_media

Average vapor pressure (in hPa).

humedad_media

Average relative humidity (in percentage).

humedad_media_8_14_20

Average relative humidity at 8, 14, and 20 hours (in percentage).

rocio_medio

Average dew point temperature (in degrees Celsius).

duracion_follaje_mojado

Duration in hours of wet foliage.

velocidad_viento_200cm_media

Average wind speed at 200 cm height (in km/h).

direccion_viento_200cm

Wind direction at 200 cm height (in degrees).

velocidad_viento_1000cm_media

Average wind speed at 1000 cm height (in km/h).

direccion_viento_1000cm

Wind direction at 1000 cm height (in degrees).

velocidad_viento_maxima

Maximum wind speed recorded (in km/h).

presion_media

Average atmospheric pressure (in hPa).

radiacion_global

Global surface radiation (in W/m²).

radiacion_neta

Net surface radiation (in W/m²).

evaporacion_tanque

Evaporation measured in a tank (in mm).

evapotranspiracion_potencial

Potential evapotranspiration (in mm).

profundidad_napa

Depth of the water table (in meters).

horas_frio

Accumulated cold hours (below 7°C).

unidad_frio

Accumulated chill units for crop analysis.

Source

Data collected from meteorological stations.
